page.title: 16COACH HIRE IN MENSTRIE
page.content: Matchett's is a large Continental Coach Hire firm that is based in Menstrie. Its fleet consists of mini-buses, standard coaches and a large two-decked coach for luxury travel. The mini-buses are used for engagements such as moving students to the University of Stirling which is nearby, and for the use of the disabled. Matchetts also work in conjunction with two or three other coach firms to share the burden of the heavy workload of the coach hire business. They also run a small ice-cream vending business using vans which tour the neighbouring housing estates.
